Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~davidkel Where should composer issues get logged? I assume not in Fabric jira...

Action.author: davidkel
Action.body: ~denyeart They can raise a stackoverflow question and tag it with hyperledger-composer, an alternative could be to raise a github issue at github.com/hyperledger/composer.

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Ok, closing since this is not a Fabric issue. Please follow-up as suggested by Dave Kelsey.
